system

Class SpaceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • system.SpaceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Space, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, Computer2Space

    public class SpaceImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Space, Computer2Space
    This acts as a channel for passing messages between Client and ComputeServers. It defines mechanisms to hold Tasks that are created by the Client jobs, to assign it to the ComputeServers and then process the Result objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
